details.scoreInfo: Score represents the average classification confidence across all detections of this object.

tooltip.noNewImages: No new images to train. Classify more images in the dataset first.
tooltip.noChanges: No changes to the dataset since last training.
tooltip.modelNotReady: Model is not ready for training

error.trainingFailed: Model training failed. Check Frigate logs for details.

deleteCategory.title: Delete Class
deleteCategory.desc: Are you sure you want to delete the class {{name}}? This will permanently delete all associated images and require re-training the model.
deleteCategory.minClassesDesc: A classification model must have at least 2 classes. Add another class before deleting this one.

deleteModel.title: Delete Classification Model
deleteModel.single: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This will permanently delete all associated data including images and training data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteModel.desc_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} model? This will permanently delete all associated data including images and training data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteModel.desc_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} models? This will permanently delete all associated data including images and training data. This action cannot be undone.

edit.title: Edit Classification Model
edit.descriptionState: Edit the classes for this state classification model. Changes will require retraining the model.
edit.descriptionObject: Edit the object type and classification type for this object classification model.
edit.stateClassesInfo: Note: Changing state classes requires retraining the model with the updated classes.

deleteDatasetImages.title: Delete Dataset Images
deleteDatasetImages.desc_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} image from {{dataset}}? This action cannot be undone and will require re-training the model.
deleteDatasetImages.desc_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} images from {{dataset}}? This action cannot be undone and will require re-training the model.

deleteTrainImages.title: Delete Train Images
deleteTrainImages.desc_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} image? This action cannot be undone.
deleteTrainImages.desc_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} images? This action cannot be undone.

renameCategory.title: Rename Class
renameCategory.desc: Enter a new name for {{name}}. You will be required to retrain the model for the name change to take affect.

description.invalidName: Invalid name. Names can only include letters, numbers, spaces, apostrophes, underscores, and hyphens.

object.title: No Object Classification Models
object.description: Create a custom model to classify detected objects.

state.title: No State Classification Models
state.description: Create a custom model to monitor and classify state changes in specific camera areas.

step1.description: State models monitor fixed camera areas for changes (e.g., door open/closed). Object models add classifications to detected objects (e.g., known animals, delivery persons, etc.).
step1.name: Name
step1.classificationTypeDesc: Sub Labels add additional text to the object label (e.g., 'Person: UPS'). Attributes are searchable metadata stored separately in the object metadata.
step1.classesStateDesc: Define the different states your camera area can be in. For example: 'open' and 'closed' for a garage door.
step1.classesObjectDesc: Define the different categories to classify detected objects into. For example: 'delivery_person', 'resident', 'stranger' for person classification.

errors.nameLength: Model name must be 64 characters or less
errors.nameOnlyNumbers: Model name cannot contain only numbers
errors.stateRequiresTwoClasses: State models require at least 2 classes

step2.description: Select cameras and define the area to monitor for each camera. The model will classify the state of these areas.
step2.selectCameraPrompt: Select a camera from the list to define its monitoring area

step3.selectImagesDescription: Click on images to select them. Click Continue when you're done with this class.
step3.allImagesRequired_one: Please classify all images. {{count}} image remaining.
step3.allImagesRequired_other: Please classify all images. {{count}} images remaining.

generating.title: Generating Sample Images
generating.description: Frigate is pulling representative images from your recordings. This may take a moment...

training.title: Training Model
training.description: Your model is being trained in the background. Close this dialog, and your model will start running as soon as training is complete.

step3.modelCreated: Model created successfully. Use the Recent Classifications view to add images for missing states, then train the model.

missingStatesWarning.title: Missing State Examples
missingStatesWarning.description: It's recommended to select examples for all states for best results. You can continue without selecting all states, but the model will not be trained until all states have images. After continuing, use the Recent Classifications view to classify images for the missing states, then train the model.
